metadata.description:
Collects Web Of Spider-Man (1985) #125, Spectacular Spider-Man (1976) #225, Green Goblin #1-13 And Amazing Scarlet Spider #2.

Before Phil Urich debuted as the deadly new Hobgoblin, he had a brief run at being a hero! But what's stranger than a heroic Green Goblin? How about super villains like Ricko the Sicko, Salt & Pepper and the Steel Slammer? Plus: the threats of Arcade, the Rhino and the Sentinels! Guest-starring Daredevil, the New Warriors and the Scarlet Spider!
metadata.name: Green Goblin
